title: N2 Natural Nutriton Detox Natur 60 Vegan Capsules
description: Food supplement with draining properties perfect for detoxifying the liver.<o:p></o:p> Helps liver function.<o:p></o:p> With artichoke and burdock, choline, riboflavin and lycopene. vegan capsules
cleaned_text: Details Detox Natur is a food supplement with draining properties that is perfect for detoxifying the liver. <o:p></o:p> Helps liver function , is diuretic, antioxidant and promotes proper digestion.<o:p></o:p> Ideal in case of slow digestion and after taking antibiotics. <o:p></o:p> - Artichoke and burdock: normal function of the intestinal tract. - Choline: for lipid metabolism.<o:p></o:p> - Riboflavin: it is vitamin B2 that contributes to the detoxification of the liver. <o:p></o:p> - Lycopene: antioxidant.<o:p></o:p> vegan capsules <o:p></o:p> Technical hydrochloride), folate (pteroylmonoglutamic acid), selenite (sodium selenite) and dye (copper complexes of chlorophyll )*. *Composition of the capsule (vegetable). Pharmaceutical review Food supplements should not replace a balanced and healthy diet. Do not exceed the recommended doses. Keep out of reach of children. Keep in a cool and dry place (recommended below 25°C). Avoid direct sunlight. Mode of use Take 2 capsules a day, in the morning. Question about N2 Natural Nutriton
